title: Him & Her: Stories Without An End
description: Him & Her is a collection of short stories that are simply moments captured in time - instances, experiences and feelings that don’t have a distinct beginning or an end.They are stories you’ve lived. They are the echoes of thoughts in your head. The dreams you can’t quite remember. Stories just beyond the realm of possibility and yet, not quite impossible.Stories from the universe. Stories of love and loss. Stories without an end.
author: Alankrita Khera
